About me

I’m a web developer with experience in front-end technologies like css, javascript, and photoshop. I work at BillFloat on the front-end team. I love music, typography, UX, and photography. You can see things I’ve done on github. I worked on the redesign at BillFloat. You can look around and get in touch with me.
